SIMBA Module

Contents:

  • SIMBA module runtime configuration.

  • Specification: run time configuration file for a module.

  • Examples

Introduction

Synopsis

SIMBA module runtime configuration.

The SIMBA module configuration specifies the configuration file provided to each module at run time

Specification

Synopsis

Specification: run time configuration file for a module.

The normative JSON schema can be found at: Module Schema

Examples

Example using a different simulation duration time for ticks.

{
  "$schema": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NSSAC/SIMBA_driver/schema/driver.json",
  "endTime" : "PT1209600S",
  "scheduleIntervals" : [
    {
      "endTick" : 6,
      "timePerTick" :  "PT600S"
    },
    {
      "endTick" : 100,
      "timePerTick" :  "PT1800S"
    },
    {
      "timePerTick" :  "PT3600S"
    }
  ]
}
